description: Tamarind contain 36% of the thiamin, 35% of the iron, 23% of magnesium and 16% of the phosphorus recommended for a day's worth of nutrition. Other prominent nutrients include niacin, calcium, vitamin C, copper, and pyridoxine.
Tamarind include weight loss, protection against cancer, and improved digestive health.
Pulp of tamarind acts as a laxative and is an excellent remedy for sluggish bowel movement. Leaves of tamarind are used in herbal tea decoctions.
Tamarind is an excellent home remedy for persons with bile problems.Pulp of tamarind is known to protect against Vitamin C deficiency.
Tamarind juice is used as a traditional medicine for jaundice sufferers.This fruit has powerful antioxidants that protect against harmful chemicals that cause cancer.
name: Tamarind
pros: Tamarind contain 36% of the thiamin, 35% of the iron, 23% of magnesium and 16% of the phosphorus recommended for a day's worth of nutrition. Other prominent nutrients include niacin, calcium, vitamin C, copper, and pyridoxine.
Tamarind include weight loss, protection against cancer, and improved digestive health.
Pulp of tamarind acts as a laxative and is an excellent remedy for sluggish bowel movement. Leaves of tamarind are used in herbal tea decoctions.
Tamarind is an excellent home remedy for persons with bile problems.Pulp of tamarind is known to protect against Vitamin C deficiency.
Tamarind juice is used as a traditional medicine for jaundice sufferers.This fruit has powerful antioxidants that protect against harmful chemicals that cause cancer.
Tamarind has some medicinal properties. It is a cure for nausea that is the most common sign of pregnancy. It also helps treat a common cold and constipation.
